question: Oversized fire doors must bear what kind of marking?
choices: Manufacturer test standard and finish classification
Manufacturer test standard and the fire-resistance rating

question: A type of load imposed by the designed use and operation within a structure is defined as?

A cricket or saddle must be installed on the ridge side of any chimney that is greater than what width?
What shall be the maximum flame spread index of foam plastic insulation?

What is the height range above a finished floor or step in which handrails shall be located?

Wire must be used to secure ceiling panels when they cannot withstand how much upward pressure?
A furnace room containing a single piece of equipment of greater than 400,000 Btu per hour shall be provided with what kind of protection?
choices: Be equipped with an automatic smoke evacuation system
Automatic sprinkler system or 1 hour separation

question: Concrete masonry columns required to have a fire rating of 4 hours must have a minimum prescriptive thickness of what?
Which table provides the minimum protection of structural parts based on the time periods for various noncombustible insulating materials?
When is an automatic sprinkler system required in an aircraft control tower?
choices: When there is an occupied floor more than 25 ft above the lowest fire department access
When there is an occupied floor more than 35 ft above the lowest fire department access
When there is an occupied floor more than 40 ft above the lowest fire department access
When there is an occupied floor more than 50 ft above the lowest fire department access

question: What is the minimum fire separation distance for an exterior wall projection from a line of 24 inches?

choices: Fire area has an occupant load of 200 or more
Fire area has an occupant load of 300 or more

question: Exit signs shall have what kind of emergency or standby power provided?

What is a permanent load comprised of fixed assets?

Fasteners for asphalt shingles shall be of what gauge?

At what rise do ramps require handrails?
Which table covers the fire resistance rating of cast in place concrete walls?
Stair risers shall have a maximum height of ______ inches?
Hazardous materials shall have what kind of emergency or standby power provided?

Fire area has an occupant load of 500

Fire area has an occupant load of 300
